By BlueBomber on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 11:55 am:

By Hellraiser83 on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 12:03 pm:

they do have ranges, but the only thing that the range determines is the letters, and well, there are the letters up there.

I prefer the colors, since it doesn't actually say in the game that those colors are those ranges, it is just implied by the colors of the techs with those ranges.

By John Hawley on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 12:39 pm:

Also, these skills can be put at any range. It just changes things like Acc, Dam and Guts used. Up and down.
